body:
So, in theory my patch fixes it, but I don't believe it because the -m
chit-chat looks to be the same, modulo cosmetic changes.  Oh, this is the
bug that Dmitry is fixing (or so it looks to me).  Never mind.


On Tue, Apr 14, 2015 at 11:00 AM, Brad Fitzpatrick <notifications@github.com
